headline.main: POLES, CZECHS PUSH CONFEDERATION PLAN; Committee Studies Details -- Benes Outlines New Blocs

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 10 -- A further advance toward the establishment of a post-war Polish-Czecho-Slovak confederation affecting the political and economic organization of Central Europe was achieved today when the coordination committee made up of representatives of both countries, began detailed studies of their problems.
abstract: Polish-Czech coms in London study problems
